mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.views, ROUND(IFNULL(avg(c.score), 0), 1), m.nickname, p.register_date FROM POST P WHERE p.id = #{id} and p.status = 'USING' JOIN MEMBER M ON M.id = p.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMENT C ON C.post_id = p.id;
select p.id, p.title, p.content, m.nickname, p.register_date from post p join member m on m.id = p.member_id where p.status = 'USING' order by p.register_date limit #{count} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from post where member_id = #{memberId} and id=#{postId} and status = 'USING'
